installCommand: git lfs install --local && (git remote get-url origin >/dev/null 2>&1 && git lfs pull || echo "Skipping git lfs pull (no remote available)") && npm install
buildCommand: git lfs install --local && (git remote get-url origin >/dev/null 2>&1 && git lfs pull || echo "Skipping git lfs pull (no remote available)") && npm run build
